explanation: Sends a single ICMP echo request with payload bytes spelling 'OPEN' (0x4f50454e) that a backdoor may use as a magic trigger. Detection: inspect ICMP payloads for static patterns and alert on devices acting upon such traffic.
rationale_steps: Craft an ICMP echo with a recognizable data pattern.
A covert listener watching ICMP payloads recognizes the magic and enables access.
Operator follows up with a connection to the newly available service.
SOC can baseline typical ICMP payload patterns and alert on anomalous fixed-content pings.
